disambiguatingDescription: Instantly recognizable by its decorative chain-and-pin signature, the Steamer Wearable Wallet in Monogram Macassar canvas is ideal for smaller essentials. The magnetic closure gives easy access to what’s inside while the shoulder strap adjusts for shoulder and cross-body wear. The reinforced corners evoke the House’s trunk-making origins.

disambiguatingDescription: The Montsouris Messenger PM in Monogram Macassar canvas is a compact cross-body bag. Versatile in terms of styling, the bag can be used as an everyday bag, thanks to its relatively spacious interior. But its crafted leather strap and the heritage feel of the shape mean that it’s also perfect for more formal occasions.

disambiguatingDescription: The sophisticated Archy Messenger MM bag is made from Monogram Macassar canvas with black-leather trim. Details such as the adjustable and removable Jacquard strap signed Louis Vuitton and leather corners and piping, make this practical bag – it’s big enough to store a 15-inch laptop – eminently stylish.

disambiguatingDescription: This redesign of the Avenue Slingbag features new crafted details and a more sustainable design, thanks to its canvas strap and interior lining. Made from Monogram Macassar canvas with black-leather trim, it exudes masculine elegance. The front zipped pocket and small zipped pocket on top of the bag make this Avenue Slingbag practical.

disambiguatingDescription: The Steamer Wearable Wallet takes on a summery feel in Monogram Eclipse Reverse canvas with colored cowhide-leather trim. The adjustable strap and reinforced corners are in a vivid turquoise, bringing a jolt of color to the monochromatic canvas. The hardware, including the signature pin-and-chain closure and the rivets on the reinforced corners, are black.

Made from Monogram-embossed Taurillon leather, it features black-color hardware and leather trim, notably its reinforced corners. The leather strap adjusts for comfortable shoulder or cross-body wear. Ideal for smaller essentials, it includes an inside zipped pocket for valuables.

disambiguatingDescription: The Keepall Bandoulière 35 is a mid-sized bag in grained Taurillon leather, embossed with the Monogram motif. It boasts all the codes of the Keepall family: lateral side bands, rolled-leather top handles, and the removable leather name tag. It can be hand-carried or worn on the shoulder or cross-body, thanks to its detachable and adjustable strap.

disambiguatingDescription: With its compact shape and on-trend design, the Catch bumbag expresses a high-fashion downtown spirit. Crafted in Monogram Eclipse canvas, it’s perfect for keeping personal items close at hand. And the fast-release buckle on the LV jacquard signature strap makes it convenient for men on the go. A practical hands-free bag that adds a stylish accent to any look.

disambiguatingDescription: Pharrell Williams adapts the Steamer Bag silhouette to wearable wallet size and creates Steamer 15. All the details of the Steamer bags are present – reinforced corners and bottom, top handle – but here the chain-and-pin closure has been replaced with a decorative lock featuring the “Louis Vuitton Marque Déposée” signature.

The magnetic lock gives easy access to the main compartment while the detachable leather handle and adjustable leather strap, also removable, enable hand- and shoulder-carry, as well as a cross-body wear.

disambiguatingDescription: The on-trend Steamer Crossbody bag is Pharrell Williams’ latest creation for the House’s Steamer line. This supple and lightweight iconic bag is fashioned from distressed Monogram Dust coated canvas with aged cowhide leather trim. The gold-color padlock with its engraved “Louis Vuitton Marque Déposée” is attached to a golden ball chain.

disambiguatingDescription: The Steamer Crossbody takes the silhouette of the House’s classic Steamer and twists it into a messenger bag with all the Steamer’s classic design details and with the L.Vuitton signature on its flap. Made from LV Colorado leather, a premium calfskin with natural small grain. This bag is ultra-comfortable to carry. It features the LV combination lock and ball chain.

This compact bag from Pharrell Williams boasts all the codes of the Soul Trunk family: reinforced corners, stitching, leather details, and the tumbler lock.

It features all the codes of the Soul Trunk family: reinforced corners and rivets, the tumbler lock, and a supple design. There’s a removable and adjustable strap in leather and a top handle inspired by those found on the House’s historic trunks.

Made from LV Colorado leather, a premium calfskin with natural small grain, it is soft and pliable. The silver-color magnetic tumbler lock and rivets and top handle evoke the House’s historic trunks. This compact bag has a removable and adjustable strap.

Paired with aged cowhide and gold-toned hardware, this bag is Pharrell Williams’ homage to the Maison’s heritage. It is signed with the red "Marque L.Vuitton Déposée" charm and the fringed leather name tag.

This bag can be styled in a myriad of ways thanks to its versatile strap: cross-body, hand-carry, or backpack.

disambiguatingDescription: The Steamer 40 is made from small-grained LV Colorado calfskin leather. This sophisticated bag boasts all the details of the historic Steamer, including leather corners and a reinforced leather bottom. The L.Vuitton silver signature on its flap reinforces the heritage of the house. Versatile, it can be worn cross-body, as a backpack, or carried as a tote. A LV combination lock, with a ball chain, completes the design.
